channel.title: Morning Medicine
channel.description: Listen to health tips, herbal recipes, and the benefits of herbal medicine, while you sip away at your coffee or tea.
channel.itunes:summary: Listen to health tips, herbal recipes, and the benefits of herbal medicine, while you sip away at your coffee or tea.
channel.itunes:author: Jack Barnum
channel.itunes:keywords: herbal, medicine, morning, health, herbal medicine, Morning Medicine

item.title: Modern Medicine V.S. Herbal Medicine
item.description: A highly debated topic, modern medicine or herbal medicine. Which one is better? In this episode you'll see both sides and the pros and cons of each.
item.author: Jack Barnum
item.content:encoded: A highly debated topic, modern medicine or herbal medicine. Which one is better? In this episode you'll see both sides and the pros and cons of each.
